poem:
### Inside Walls of Silence

Beyond the fences of fear,  
whispers of the caged  
echo cold iron despair.  
In the dark, names dissolve—  
souls cloaked by shadows,  
grains lost in the hourglass  
of injustice served.  
Who will speak the unspoken,  
and beckon light's return  
to these voiceless corridors  
where humanity waits,  
crippled yet unbroken?
